articles.title: ‘Irresponsible’ Trump Tariff Threat Draws Ire of BRICS Host Lula - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Brazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva joined South Africa in blasting Donald Trump for his threat to slap extra tariffs against the BRICS, escalating a spat with the US leader during the final day hosting the 10-member group.
